PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^xAF6025^xD02090Full Guide can be found on YourMMO:^7^7 https://your-mmo.com/path-of-exile/guides/league-starter-builds/poisonous-concoction-of-bouncing-pathfinder/
^xFFFF77Leveling Talent Tree:^7 https://poeplanner.com/b/0Gz ^xFFFF77Midgame Talent Tree:^7 https://poeplanner.com/b/0GH
^xAF6025^xD02090Leveling^7^7 ^xFFFF77Act 1^7 Caustic Arrow - Pierce - Mirage Archer Burning Arrow (for Bosses) Blink Arrow Withering Step War Banner Shrapnel Ballista - Faster Attacks Smoke Mine
^xFFFF77Act 2^7 In Act 2, Players are tasked to kill three Bosses, Oak, Kraityn and Alira. You can either 'Help' or 'Kill' them, whenever you engage with them. You can 'Help' only one of them, or kill them all. This Quest will grant Players a Bonus for their Character Power, depending on their choice. This choice can be changed later on if you made a mistake.
In our Build, we help Alira and kill other Bandits.
Poisonous Concoction - Volley - Lesser Multiple Projectiles Withering Step War Banner Skitter Bots Blood Rage Herald of Agony Smoke Mine
^xFFFF77Act 3^7 Poisonous Concoction - Volley - Lesser Multiple Projectiles - Unbound Ailments Withering Step War Banner Skitter Bots Blood Rage Herald of Agony Plague Bearer Despair Shield Charge - Faster Attacks
^xFFFF77Act 5 - 10^7 Check Vendors for 4-linked Items. Make sure your Resistances are high, especially after Kitava in Act 5.
Poisonous Concoction - Greater Volley - Greater Multiple Projectiles - Unbound Ailments Withering Step War Banner Skitter Bots Blood Rage Herald of Agony Plague Bearer - Increased Area of Effect Despair Shield Charge - Faster Attacks
^xD02090Jewels & Sockets^7 The list of Gems includes suggestions for various rare gems that can be put into socket slots, especially upon reaching the higher Endgame. Other Unique Jewels are a good choice aswell, but can become really expensive.
^xFFFF77Rare Jewels^7 Chaos Damage over Time Multiplier Damage over Time Multiplier Maximum Life
^xFFFF77Cluster Jewels^7 Large Chaos Damage - Unholy Grace / Unwaveringly Evil / Wicked Pall Medium Damage over Time - Brewed for Potency / Circling Oblivion
^xAF6025Unique Jewels^7 The Adorned (use corrupted Magic Jewels) Watcher's Eye (Malevolence) Forbidden Flame/Flesh (Quartz Infusion)
^xD02090Gems & Abilities^7 This list includes all desirable Skill & Support Gems. Awakened Gems can be freely equipped aswell, but are not included in this list. The Support Gems are listed in order, with the most important ones in the top. Replacements for certain Gems until Players obtain them can be found in the right column.
^x8888FF^x7070FFPoisonous Concoction of Bouncing^7^7 ^x7070FFGreater Multiple Projectiles Unbound Ailments Void Manipulation Deadly Ailments Vicious Projectiles^7 Do not use Vicious Projectiles until 6-Link Auras in Helmet
^x7070FFPurity of Elements Vaal Grace Petrified Blood^7 ^x7070FFEnlighten^7 Use Skitterbots instead of Grace until you get Enlighten, but still have enough Mana Reservation
^x7070FFHerald of Agony Precision (Lvl.1)^7
^x7070FFArcanist Brand Despair Temporal Chains Inspiration^7 Do not use Temporal Chains until you can apply two Curses Use ^x7070FFImmortal Call^7 until you are strong enough to kill enemies before they kill you
^x7070FFMalevolence Divine Blessing Inspiration^7 Keep Divine Blessing on Level 1 if you struggle with Mana
^x7070FFDash
^7^xD02090Atlas Passive Tree^7^7 The Atlas Talent Tree can alter your game experience heavily. This Tree is designed to empower and direct certain League Mechanics towards your personal preference. Beware that the suggested Talent Tree works pretty well with the current Build, but this may differ for each individual player. Take this Suggestion with caution! This Passive Tree focuses on Increased Chance to drop adjacent Maps, allowing players to progress into higher Tier Maps fast. This Tree does not include any other League Mechanics which should be chosen on players preference. We also focus on dropping Maps 1 Tier Higher, aswell as additional Kirac Missions. After skilling into Unwavering Vision (rewarding 20 Atlas Passive Skill Points), feel free to skill into any league mechanic that you feel is enjoyable. ^xFFFF77Atlas Passive Tree:^7 https://poeplanner.com/a/xk6
